snippet.title: "Bo: Path of The Teal Lotus" Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
About Bo:

Bo is a hand-drawn 2D Metroidvania based in a colorful world of Japanese folklore. You play as a tiny fox spirit that grows from lotus blossom after being blessed by the moon god. It is an indie game being developed by Squid Shock Studios.

😍Our links: https://linktr.ee/SquidShockStudios
💚KICKSTARTER: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/...
☕STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/16...
🐤TWITTER: https://twitter.com/SquidShock
🟪TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/squidshockstudios
▶YOUTUBE:   

 / @squidshockstudio...  
🎧DISCORD: https://discord.gg/mvXDhcamxc
🔤FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/SquidShockSt...
📷INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/squidshockstudios
🔗WEBSITE: Squidshockstudios.com
📋PRESS KIT: https://drive.google.com/drive/folder...

🎌Our Kickstarter will go LIVE on February 1st 8AM EST! Please support if you believe in our project! The game can't be finished without your help! Follow the page here: 💚KICKSTARTER: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/...

Indie game, Video Game, Indie developer, ukiyoe, yokai, PC, Nintendo Switch, Steam
